Events.OnCreate:
(switch ; Only valid for Point Juno (!= (objGetType aOwnerObj) &stPointJuno;) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Create the mission (block (pos alphaLeader betaLeader markerObj) ; Create Ares Alpha fleet (setq pos (sysVectorPolarOffset aOwnerObj (random 80 100) 600))
(setq alphaLeader (sysCreateShip &tbCSCPointJunoAlphaFleet; pos &svAres;)) (msnSetData gSource 'alphaID (objGetID alphaLeader)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource alphaLeader)
(for i 0 5 (block (sentryObj) (setq sentryObj (sysCreateShip &scAresSentry; (sysVectorPolarOffset pos (* i 60) 20) &svAres;)) (shpOrder sentryObj 'hold) ; Aggressor setting means the sentry will attack without provocation (shpSetAISetting sentryObj 'aggressor True) ))
; Create Ares Beta fleet (setq pos (sysVectorPolarOffset aOwnerObj (random 10 40) (random 400 500))) (setq betaLeader (sysCreateShip &tbCSCPointJunoBetaFleet; pos &svAres;)) (msnSetData gSource 'betaID (objGetID betaLeader)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource betaLeader)
(for i 0 11 (block (sentryObj) (setq sentryObj (sysCreateShip &scAresSentry; (sysVectorPolarOffset pos (* i 30) 20) &svAres;)) (shpOrder sentryObj 'hold) (shpSetAISetting sentryObj 'aggressor True) ))
; Create a marker for the fleet position ; stagingBeta marks the Anti Trojan asteroids (setq pos (objGetPos (sysGetObjectByName 'stagingBeta))) (setq markerObj (sysCreateMarker "Asteroid Field" (sysGetObjectByName 'stagingBeta) &svAres;)) (msnSetData gSource 'markerID (objGetID markerObj))
; Set reward (msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 1200) ) )
Events.OnGlobalSystemStarted:
(switch ; If not in PJ, then nothing to do (!= (sysGetNode) 'PJ) Nil
; If we've already created this mission, then nothing to do (msnFind "* +unid:&msCSCPointJunoAresAttack;;") Nil
; Create the mission (msnCreate &msCSCPointJunoAresAttack; (sysFindObject Nil "TAN +pointJuno;")) )
Events.OnAccepted:
(block ( (stationObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (alphaLeader (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'alphaID))) ) ; Need notification if/when player is destroyed (msnRegisterForEvents gSource gPlayerShip)
(if (not (msnGetData gSource 'status)) ; Normal start (block Nil ; Orders to alpha fleet (if alphaLeader (block Nil (shpCancelOrders alphaLeader) (shpOrder alphaLeader 'attack stationObj) ) ) ; Create some ships off-screen a bring them in (intFleetCreateWingmen gSource 8 &scCenturionM;)
; Set a timer in case we don't find the fleet quickly enough (msnAddTimerEvent gSource 3600 'OnTimerZeroHour)
(msnSetData gSource 'status 'findBeta) )
; Attack is underway when player started Nil ) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(block ( (status (msnGetData gSource 'status)) (stationObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (alphaLeader (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'alphaID))) (betaLeader (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'betaID))) ) (switch ; Alpha leader destroyed (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'alphaID)) (switch ; Done with alpha and beta (not betaLeader) (block Nil (objSendMessage gPlayerShip stationObj (msnTranslate gSource 'SuccessMsg)) (msnSetData gSource 'status 'oneLastAttack) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
; If we haven't started the mission yet, then send beta fleet ; to attack Point Juno (or (not status) (= status 'defaultAttack)) (block Nil (shpCancelOrders betaLeader) (shpOrder betaLeader 'attack stationObj) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip stationObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgUnderAttack)) ;(msnSetData gSource 'status 'destroyBeta) ;(msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
; If we're looking for beta fleet, then we're OK (or (= status 'findBeta) (= status 'destroyBeta)) (block Nil ;(msnSetData gSource 'status 'destroyBeta) ;(msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
(objSendMessage gPlayerShip stationObj (cat "ERROR: Alpha destroyed; status = " status)) )
; Beta leader destroyed (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'betaID)) (switch ; Done with alpha and beta (not alphaLeader) (block Nil (objSendMessage gPlayerShip stationObj (msnTranslate gSource 'SuccessMsg)) (msnSetData gSource 'status 'oneLastAttack) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
; If we haven't started the mission yet, then send alpha fleet ; to attack Point Juno (or (not status) (= status 'defaultAttack)) (block Nil (shpCancelOrders alphaLeader) (shpOrder alphaLeader 'attack stationObj) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip stationObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgUnderAttack)) ;(msnSetData gSource 'status 'destroyAlpha) ;(msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
; If we're looking for beta fleet, then defend point juno (or (= status 'findBeta) (= status 'destroyBeta)) (block Nil (objSendMessage gPlayerShip stationObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgUnderAttack)) (msnSetData gSource 'status 'destroyAlpha) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) )
(objSendMessage gPlayerShip stationObj (cat "ERROR: Beta destroyed; status = " status)) )
; Gamma ship destroyed (= (objGetData aObjDestroyed 'PJMission1_gamma) (objGetID gSource)) (block Nil ; Do we need to update the players target (if (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'gammaID)) (block Nil ; LATER: check that these ships belog to this mission instance (msnSetData gSource 'gammaID (objGetID (sysFindObject gPlayerShip "sAND:PJMission1_gamma;"))) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) ) )
; Check if this was the last target (if (leq (msnIncData gSource 'gammaShips -1) 0) (msnSuccess gSource) ) ) ) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch (= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'findBeta) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'markerID)) 'attack)
(= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'destroyAlpha) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'alphaID)) 'attack)
(= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'destroyBeta) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'betaID)) 'attack)
(= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'oneLastAttack) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID)) 'dock)
(= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'destroyGamma) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gammaID)) 'attack) )
Events.OnTimerDefaultAttack:
; If the player never accepts the mission, we nevertheless send out ; Alpha fleet to attack (if (not (msnGetProperty gSource 'isActive)) (block ( (stationObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (alphaLeader (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'alphaID))) )
; Orders to alpha fleet (shpCancelOrders alphaLeader) (shpOrder alphaLeader 'attack stationObj)
; Set a timer for beta fleet (msnAddTimerEvent gSource 3600 'OnTimerZeroHour)
(msnSetData gSource 'status 'defaultAttack) ) )
Events.OnTimerZeroHour:
(block ( (stationObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (alphaLeader (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'alphaID))) (betaLeader (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'betaID))) ) (if betaLeader (block Nil ; Order alpha fleet to fall-back (shpCancelOrders alphaLeader) (shpOrder alphaLeader 'gate)
; Order the beta fleet to attack (shpCancelOrders betaLeader) (shpOrder betaLeader 'attack stationObj)
; Recall player (if (msnGetProperty gSource 'isActive) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip stationObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgReturn)) ) ) ) )
Events.OnCanBrief:
(switch ; If the mission started without the player, then show ; busy message until first two waves are completed
; Should call msnAccept here and point player at alpha (= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'defaultAttack) (msnTranslate gSource 'textBusy) )
Events.OnInProgress:
(block ( (status (msnGetData gSource 'status)) (stationObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) ) (switch (and (= status 'oneLastAttack) (not (objIsUnderAttack stationObj))) (block ( (pos (sysVectorPolarOffset stationObj (random 120 240) 500)) gammaID ) ; Create Ares Gamma fleet (enum (sysCreateShip &tbCSCPointJunoGammaFleet; pos &svAres;) theShip (block Nil (shpOrder theShip 'attack stationObj) (objSetIdentified theShip) (objSetData theShip 'PJMission1_gamma (objGetID gSource)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource theShip) (msnIncData gSource 'gammaShips) (if (not gammaID) (setq gammaID (objGetID theShip))) ) )
(msnSetData gSource 'gammaID gammaID)
; Update mission state (msnSetData gSource 'status 'destroyGamma) (msnSetData gSource 'briefGamma True) (msnSetProperty gSource 'summary (msnTranslate gSource 'Summary))
; This is a risky mission, so save the game (msnSetData gSource 'missionCheckpoint True) ) ) )
Events.OnInProgressUndock:
(block Nil ; Mark the debrief as being completed so we don't show it again. (msnSetData gSource 'briefGamma Nil)
; Checkpoint if necessary (if (msnGetData gSource 'missionCheckpoint) (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'missionCheckpoint Nil) (gamSave 'missionCheckpoint) ) ) )
Events.OnCanDebrief:
(block (wingmenLeft) ; Wingmen leave (setq wingmenLeft (intFleetDisperseWingmen gSource)) (msnSetData gSource 'wingmenLeft wingmenLeft)
Nil )
